title: NutriVal
description: A web application that allows users to search for food items and their nutritional value. The user can also create a custom food item and add it to their profile.

title: PWA Budget Tracker
description: An on and offline application the can add and subtract expenses from a budget with or without a connection.  When transactions are entered offline the data is stored and cached until an online connection is established, once connection is on the data is updated and saved to application.

title: Workout Tracker
description: An application that is able to view, create, and track daily workouts. A User can track multiple exercises in a workout on a given day. A User can also track the name, type, weight, sets, reps, and duration of exercise. If the exercise is a cardio exercise, a User can track by distance traveled.

title: Code Quiz
description: Created a little Javascript quiz for familiarity and understanding.

title: Password Generator
description: A web application that allows users to generate a password randomly.
